query:
INSERT INTO order_product (
                    order_uuid,
                    is_additional,
                    name,
                    price,
                    image_type,
                    image_type_id,
                    content
                ) VALUES
                (
                    $1, TRUE,
                    (SELECT name FROM product WHERE uuid = $2),
                    (SELECT price FROM product WHERE uuid = $2),
                    (SELECT image_type FROM product WHERE uuid = $2),
                    (SELECT image_type_id FROM product WHERE uuid = $2),
                    (SELECT content FROM product WHERE uuid = $2)
                )
